sentences.sContent: a French film with English subtitles
sentences.sCn: 附有英语字幕的法国电影

sentences.sContent: "Lorna Doone" is subtitled "a Romance of Exmoor."
sentences.sCn: 《洛娜·杜恩》的副标题是《埃克斯穆尔的一个浪漫故事》。

synos.tran: [计][图情]副标题；说明或对白的字幕
在…上印字幕；给…加副标题

trans.tranCn: 副标题；说明或对白的字幕
trans.tranOther: the words printed over a film in a foreign language to translate what is being said by the actors

trans.tranCn: 在…上印字幕；给…加副标题
trans.tranOther: If you say how a book or play is subtitled, you say what its subtitle is
